title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Chart of the Day for Oct. 30
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Chart of the Day for Oct. 30
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUESTS:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his Chart of the Day "Smaller S&P 500 stocks hold their own as tech surges." Email Dave at DWilson@bloomberg.net to sign up for the Chart.\u0010\u0010Drew Reading\u0010Analyst:Home Builders\u0010Bloomberg Intelligence\u0010Discussing Lennar Corp. agreeing to acquire CalAtlantic Group Inc. for about $5.7 billion in cash and stock to form the biggest U.S. homebuilder, abullish indicator for growth and the industry’s largest takeover ever.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
